cumulated.origin: |- wb(wbr(c0, cfv(ccrcts, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wceq(cfv(c2, nat0), cfv(c2, cfv(chash, c0)))))

comment: Sufficient and necessary conditions for a pair of functions to be a circuit (in an undirected graph): A pair of function "is" (represents) a circuit iff it is a closed trail. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 31-Jan-2021.) (Revised by AV, 30-Oct-2021.)
